body:
Show us the exception.log please.
Also yes, removing the shellmap will crash the game.

exception.log (last) = debug 5, other a bit diffrent, the other u can see next under this...

Red Alert Mod at Version release-20150919
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.34209
Exception of type `System.IO.EndOfStreamException`: Attempted to read past the end of the stream.
